summary: After his parents are killed in a car accident, Cody is left dealing with enormous guilt, caring for his younger brother and the persistent thought of how to bring his parents back to life.... See full summary »
cast: Sasha Andreev|Michelle Bergh|Lynette Biunno|Matthew Feeney|Emily Fradenburgh|Bill Gorman|Ted Hall|Mari Harris|Max Hauser|Katrina Hawley|Ellen Karsten|Gary David Keast|Laurie King|Daniel Sjerven|Joel Thingvall|Carol Vnuk|Corey Walton|Jim Westcott
title: Phasma Ex Machina
